title: Expect two-wheeler industry to see double-digit revenue growth next fiscal, says Hero MotoCorp CEO
description: Hero MotoCorp CEO Niranjan Gupta expects double-digit revenue growth in the domestic two-wheeler industry next fiscal. Demand for premium models, feature-rich trims, digital inclusion, the hospitality industry, entry level segment, rural areas, sales outlets, and the Harley-Davidson partnership are all expected to perform better.
